resources.string: Rates quoted in %1$s. All taxes or fees due at pick-up will be settled in the local currency (%2$s).

The price of your car has changed. Please confirm the new price to continue.
Names must not contain numbers or special characters.
Phone number length must be between 4 and 20.
Hmm…Your payment didn\'t go through. Please double check your payment details and try again.

You can cancel free of charge until {hours} hours before your reservation starts. After that time, no cancellations, changes or refunds will be made.
This reservation is non-refundable and cannot be changed or cancelled after booking.

There aren\'t enough adults (age 12+) to have infants sit in laps. They need their own seats.
Will infants under age 2 (at time of flight) sit in laps or have their own seats?
Infants in seats need their own tickets. Let\'s search again for the infants\' tickets.
Infants in lap don\'t need their own tickets. We\'ll start a new search with fewer tickets.

You\'ll earn %1$s points for this trip!

Please enter a valid email address
The %1$s resort fee will be collected at the hotel. The total price for your stay will be %2$s.
The total for your trip will be %1$s. You\'ll pay the hotel the total cost of your booking (in the hotel\'s local currency) during your stay.
A deposit of %1$s will be collected now. You\'ll pay the hotel the remaining cost of your booking (in the hotel\'s local currency) during your stay.
The total for your trip, including %1$s resort fee, will be %2$s. You\'ll pay the hotel the total cost of your booking (in the hotel\'s local currency) during your stay.
The total for your trip, including %1$s resort fee, will be %2$s. You\'ll pay the hotel the remaining cost of your booking (in the hotel\'s local currency) during your stay.

You will save %s if you book your hotel now!
• Your flight is a combination of two one-way fares, each subject to its own rules and restrictions.
Your flight is a combination of two one-way fares, each subject to its own rules and restrictions.
• If one of your flights is changed or cancelled, it will not automatically alter the other flight. Changes to the other flight may incur a charge.
If one of your flights is changed or cancelled, it will not automatically alter the other flight. Changes to the other flight may incur a charge.
• Outbound and Inbound flights have their own baggage fees
Outbound and Inbound flights have their own baggage fees
It looks like the airline just raised the price of your ticket by %1$s. Are you happy to pay the new total of %2$s?
We just found your requested flights on sale for %1$s less. Are you happy for us to charge you a new total of %2$s?
It looks like the airline is charging a payment processing fee of %1$s. Are you happy to pay a new total of %2$s?
It looks like the airline is charging a payment processing fee of %1$s and has just raised the price of your ticket by %2$s. Are you happy to pay a new total of %3$s?
It looks like the airline is charging a payment processing fee of %1$s but we just found your requested flights on sale for %2$s less. Are you happy to pay a new total of %3$s?
The credit card number you entered is invalid, please try again.
The cardholder name that you entered does not match the name on the credit card. Please try again.

Sorry, we don\'t seem to be able to process your order right now. Please try again.
Sorry, we don\'t seem to be able to process your order right now. Please try again or call {brand} Customer Support and quote this itinerary number: {itinerary}

We\'re really sorry, one of your flights is no longer available from {brand}.

Cancellation is free, right up to the hotel\'s cancellation window.

Cancellation is free, right up to the hotel\'s cancellation window.
Your deposits will never exceed the total cost of your booking.
